column2: I come here for breakfast every now and then ... ordered a mocha and the occasional breakfast sandwich. Good cup of coffee. managed by one person, she is a sweetheart.  Good service, friendly, not a large menu but has good breakfast items. Small wait, everything is made to order.

Hello Ms. Jenny Hoang, My apology for the late reply to thank you and appreciate your kind review. During this time that almost everyone prepares to get back to our new routine, any gestures showing of support and compassionate are very encouraging. I look forward to serving you again soon. Jang

Sooo good!!! The lady made our bagels and coffees with love and care!  So much flavor. The location is pretty small and they don't have any seating yet but I'll definitely come here again if I'm in the area.

Hello Mr. Neal, very much appreciate your kind feed back with an honor of 5 stars rating.  I am so happy to have an opportunity to serve you and please accept my apology not be able to provide you with a seating due to the City of San Francisco special ordinance during Covid 19 pandamic.  Look forward to serving you again soon. Jang
Went in there because of a Disaster Evacuation Drill occurred at the State Department building across the street.  I waited and chilled having the best coffee from an independent outfit.
Hello Lee, Happy Holidays and look forward to serving you again in the year 2022.

The owner is incredibly nice and makes some great coffee!! I got an almond milk latte and my cousin got an oat milk mocha and said it was INCREDIBLE. have been back every day since. My new coffe spot in the city for sure.
Mr. Adam Khan, Appreciate your review. I look forward to serving you on your next visit. Jang

This little hole in the wall is the place to go for a hungry person who wants fast delicious food. The vendor made my food which love and care. Gave my 2 year old a free water. Sometimes we need people to care for us.

Hello Darlene Love, thank you so much for your feed back. I'm so lucky having been  inhibiting at this location, 401 Golden Gate Avenue  for more than ten years. This place allows me to meet  lovely people, and a lovely family like yours.  It's so uplifting feeling to realize that this short moment during food ordering transaction could reflect heart- felt gestures.  In appreciation, Jang

Very cute place, Philz was backed up so I popped in here. Greeted by the lady and eyes fell on the rows of gleaming Chinese baos . Asked for a regular cup of black coffee with shot of espresso and a bbq bao. There is a 5$ min for credit card use. Great cup of coffee, fresh and strong and the bao hit the spot. Would definitely come here again.
Dear Ms. Khanna, thank you & appreciate your review. Look forward to serving you everyday of the week!
I ordered a bagel and a cappuccino. I would give 5 for excellent service and 5 for the bagel. But the coffee was not that great.
Our honor for the opportunity to serve you and will adjust the coffee taste and brewing seriously from your valuable comment. From all of us at both North and South sides.
Excellent coffee. Great bagel sandwiches. AMAZING SERVICE. If you're working at the Phillip Burton Federal Building in San Francisco you must go here for lunch and coffee.
Hello Scott, look forward to serving you soon. Happy Holidays! Jang
Great spot! I always grab coffee and a bagel on my way to work. Great food, great prices and managed by a great owner.
Thanks again Max, for your kind review and your patron. We will miss you and look forward to serving you when you are in the area again. Jang
I get an iced coffee every morning. The owner and employees are very friendly and welcoming. The food is good too, pastries and bagels for breakfast, sandwiches and packaged salads for lunch.
Hello Ms. Rice, Happy Holidays and I look forward to serving you again in the year 2022.
Best chai tea latte and cheese bagel with butter.  Very nice personal service where they remember your name and order if you frequent the place.

Hello Ms. Cookie La Paz, appreciate your comment - thank you on behalf of The CoffeeSmith. A customer like you always inspires us to work at our best everyday, to make the best drinks and food. Cheers!!!
Very friendly owner, with great food. I love the Egg Smith Veggie. Good coffee and pastry.
Passport photo $18 incl tax. Quick and easy.
Good coffee and excellent bao with friendly service. It's also right next to Philz so it's a great spot for when Philz gets too busy.
Dear Mr. Gadagkar, thank you and appreciate your comment. Besides the bao, we now add Tea- Leaf Salad to the menu. Will see you again soon.
Small place but they make excellent coffee and breakfast sandwiches on the spot
Hello Mr. Watters, thank you for your kind review- short but so powerful to convince others. In appreciation, Jang
Best breakfast we had in SF! Fresh, organic and super friendly staff. Highly recommended!!
Happy Holidays to both of you.
The best place in San Fran for a coffee and a lox bagel to die for.  Owner Jen is the best part of everything.
John, I can't reach you on your official email address.
I love the bagels. The owner is also very friendly.

Sorry my late reply. I'm really appreciated your kind review and look forward to serving you again. FYI, we started another location in the Federal Building, north-side of Golden Gate Avenue, across from 401 at the corner of the State building. Will see you soon. Jang
Coffee Smith is the right place take coffee and sandwiches. I love egg smith with veggies and also tuna sandwich.

Dear Reddy, appreciate your review after one year as our daily royal customer. You made my year on this New Year Eve. Happy New Year to you, your family and all of your colleagues at State Building. My Best, Jang....
Very good place and a friendly staff. All that ordered was great.
Thank you so much for your review. I hope you and your family enjoyed our food. Happy Holidays. Jang and staff.
Great food and coffee for a reasonable price. Very friendly staff! ☕️
Hello Chris, Happy Holidays and I look forward to serving you soon in the year 2022.
Staff is always nice and their EggsSmith bagel sandwiches never disappoint!
Hello Amber, much appreciate your kind review and look forward to serving you again soon. Cheers:)
Wondful super nice people here. Next time I'm close by will visit again!

Hello Pika Chu, appreciated your review with  five stars rating. The CoffeeSmith always take pride in delivery foods, drinks and services to make our customers happy. Your feed back really thrives us to stay alive during this vulnerable business downturn. Sincerely, Jang
The best sandwich in town!! 5 stars customer services!! love this place
Hello Ariss Saki, thank you and appreciate your review. Hope to have you with us more often. Jang
Great service, great coffee!
Morgan, thank you so much for your times on the review.
Excellent service. The lady that takes care of the place is a lovely person.
My apology on my late reply but super glad to get your comments. Please stop by again when you have a chance. Jang Samithavej
Family owned coffee shop that has priced items that below those of the major coffee shops.
Thank you Mr. Langston Joe  for your review. The CoffeeSmith always takes pride to make our customer experiences a valuable one.
Best house coffee experience with friendly services!
very good coffee

A gas station for kindness and humanity in this slightly spooky and homeless town! delicious chai latte and the staff is so super friendly! The perfect place for a little break from the misery out there. We even got free tickets to an Asian art museum! Thanks for that!

Hi Josi, Thank you for stopping by at The CoffeeSmith on your last day in San Francisco and the last day in the US. Our world needs more and more international frienships; you and Magdana have made a little peace in this world on your trip. We appreciate your friendship. Auf Wiedersehen! Jang Samithavej

The area here is not nice. However, we found this wonderful little cafe. The coffee tastes good and we got macaroons to try. We had a nice chat with the lovely waitress. Thanks very much.  greetings The girls from Germany

Hello Magdalena, Super glad on your comments especially in German. Hope you and Josi have had good memories on your US trips even though some excited scenario on the street of San Francisco! Have a safe trip back home. Auf Wiedersehen. From Jang Samithavej
Hello Michael, Appreciate your spending time in rating The Coffeesmith. Jang
Hello Ms. Lamboglia, appreciate your kind rating. I look forward to serving you again. Jang
Hello Xavier, Happy Holidays for 2022 and beyond. Jang
Dear Ms. Francesca Sta Maria, appreciate your five stars review and look forward to serving you again and again....
David, thank you kindly for your 5 stars rating.
Hello Jhonathan Cristo, Appreciate your rating...thank you and look forward to serving  you again soon. Jang
